articles.title: CDC chief says there could be second, possibly worse coronavirus outbreak this winter - CNN
articles.description: A second coronavirus outbreak could emerge this winter in conjunction with the flu season to make for an even more dire health crisis, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention told The Washington Post in an interview.
articles.content:

articles.description: Despite uncertainties, some scientists are betting that blood tests will help end lockdowns and get people back to work.
articles.content:
